description: misc/dashboard/codereview: send mail to assigned reviewers if they aren't already looped in.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

On Mon, Apr 30, 2012 at 5:26 PM, <dsymonds@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> misc/dashboard/codereview: send mail to assigned reviewers if they
> aren't already looped in.
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**6128054/<http://codereview.appspot.com/6128054/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M misc/dashboard/codereview/**dashboard/cl.go
>  M misc/dashboard/codereview/**dashboard/people.go
>
>
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6a17ff5f4b33 ***

misc/dashboard/codereview: send mail to assigned reviewers if they aren't already looped in.
